item.title: Impact of intensive care unit discharge delays on patient outcomes: a retrospective cohort study
Clinical Intervention Prediction and Understanding with Deep Neural Networks
Right ventricular function, peripheral edema, and acute kidney injury in critical illness
MIMIC-III, a freely accessible critical care database
item.description:
MIMIC supports a diverse range of analytic studies spanning epidemiology, clinical decision-rule improvement, and electronic tool development. It is notable for three factors:

  • it is freely available to researchers worldwide
  • it encompasses a diverse and very large population of ICU patients
  • it contains high temporal resolution data including lab results, electronic documentation, and bedside monitor trends and waveforms.

More detail on MIMIC-III can be found with the MIMIC-III online documentation.

item.title: External Validation Of The Sepsis-3 Guidelines
